scheme_name: Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Higher Education Assurance Scheme (Pudhumai Penn Scheme)
description: The Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Higher Education Assurance Scheme (Pudhumai Penn Scheme) in Tamil Nadu provides financial assistance to girl students from government schools to pursue higher education, promoting gender equality in education.
key_features: Targets girl students from government schools

benefits.financial_assistance: Rs. 1,000 per month for higher education expenses

education_criteria: Must have studied in government schools from Class 6 to 12
Must be enrolled in a recognized higher education institution
residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Tamil Nadu

eligible_activities: Pursuing higher education (degree, diploma, or professional courses)
Covering education-related expenses like fees or books

steps: Visit the Tamil Nadu Higher Education Department portal
Submit an online application with enrollment details
Upload required documents, including Aadhaar and education certificates
Applications are reviewed by the department
application_process.note: Applicants must provide proof of enrollment

special_notes: Assistance is directly credited to studentsâ€™ bank accounts
Priority is given to economically disadvantaged students
